entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early this morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Saturday 21 January 2023
